video.title: From Dusk Till Dawn: The Series
video.synopsis: Bank-robbing brothers encounter vengeful lawmen and demons south of the border in this original series based on Robert Rodriguez' cult horror film.

episodes.synopsis: A pit stop at a liquor store leads to a deadly standoff for bank robbers Seth and Richie Gecko, who are making a run for the Mexican border.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Richie's visions intensify as the Gecko Brothers escape the liquor store with dogged lawman Freddie Gonzalez in close pursuit.
episodes.title: Blood Runs Thick

episodes.synopsis: Forced to stop at a motel, Seth makes a plan with Carlos to cross the border while Richie struggles with his visions.
episodes.title: Mistress

episodes.synopsis: Attempting to leave the motel undetected, the Gecko Brothers take the Fuller family hostage.
episodes.title: Let's Get Ramblin'

episodes.synopsis: After a daring escape, Seth leads the Fuller's RV to the border crossing while an irrational fear takes hold of Richie.
episodes.title: Self-Contained

episodes.synopsis: The Geckos and Fullers get more than they bargained for when they enter the Titty Twister; Seth senses his deal with Carlos may be slipping away.
episodes.title: Place of Dead Roads

episodes.synopsis: Santánico Pandemonium takes the stage as the Gecko brothers and the Fuller family sit down to watch the performance of a lifetime.
episodes.title: Pandemonium

episodes.synopsis: As Santánico attempts to sway Richie to her cause, Freddie confronts Carlos about his destiny and the temple's mysterious past.
episodes.title: La Conquista

episodes.synopsis: To free Santánico, Seth and Richie must face the labyrinth within the temple. Meanwhile, Freddie uncovers a new lead in the cartel-killer case.
episodes.title: Boxman

episodes.synopsis: Seth and Richie defeat the labyrinth, only to find they've been double-crossed. Meanwhile, the Fullers confront their demons.
episodes.title: The Take

episodes.synopsis: Three months after freeing Santánico, the Gecko Brothers are still on the run. Richie and Santánico plot revenge. Seth and Kate are lost in Mexico.
episodes.title: Opening Night

episodes.synopsis: Seth and Kate pull off a heist. Ranger Freddie Gonzalez confronts nightmarish visions. Back at the Twister, Carlos emerges from the Labyrinth.
episodes.title: In a Dark Time

episodes.synopsis: To infiltrate Malvado's food supply, Richie and Santánico pose as sex traffickers. Sonja forces Seth to kick drugs. Freddie and Sex Machine face off.
episodes.title: Attack of the 50 Ft. Sex Machine

episodes.synopsis: Kate hunts down Scott before he can get revenge. Richie and Santánico end up in the flesh trade. Seth tries to get back in Uncle Eddie's good graces.
episodes.title: The Best Little Horror House in Texas

episodes.synopsis: Calling a truce, Richie and Seth team up to find Malvado's headquarters. Carlos abducts and claims Santánico for himself. Kate enlists Freddie's help.
episodes.title: Bondage

episodes.synopsis: Freddie and Kate uncover an epic secret and become trapped in the cellar of Oculto, one of the more reclusive and dangerous Lords of the Night.
episodes.title: Bizarre Tales

episodes.synopsis: Richie and Seth hatch a plan to complete Santánico's revenge and walk away with the score of a lifetime. Freddie and Kate face an unexpected foe.
episodes.title: Bring Me the Head of Santanico Pandemonium

episodes.synopsis: As the pieces of the big job fall into place, the uneasy trust between brothers and partners crumbles in light of betrayals and new loyalties.
episodes.title: The Last Temptation of Richard Gecko

episodes.synopsis: With Seth's help, Santánico confronts Malvado. Richie and Kate must stop Carlos and Scott from overturning the ancient prophecy.
episodes.title: There Will Be Blood

episodes.synopsis: Seth and Santánico clash with Richie over his betrayal. Carlos and Scott aim to take Malvado's empire and unleash culebra frenzy on the world.
episodes.title: Santa Sangre
